column3: Latest;Siem Reap:------ Banteay Srei military police detained a military officer who set his adulterous wife on fire with petrol.------The suspect
column6: is a military officer in the air defense unit of Intervention Unit No. 2. His wife Chea Savy is 37.------Before the incident
column7: the husband found out that his wife had been in a relationship with another man. He attacked while she was sleeping in a hammock
column8: causing serious injuries and then set her on fire. The victim was taken to the hospital
column9: but her injuries were too severe (*it appears she died).------After the incident
column10: Banteay Srei military police forces arrested the suspect and will send him to Siem Reap Provincial Court for legal action. ------KBN
